channel.title: ASF Jira
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HIVE-21872] Bucketed tables that load data from data/files/auto_sortmerge_join should be tagged as 'bucketing_version'='1'
item.description: It is incorrect to use version 2, since the data files were created with old hash function.
item.summary: Bucketed tables that load data from data/files/auto_sortmerge_join should be tagged as 'bucketing_version'='1'

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
